runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in @WindowDuration@s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within @WindowDuration@s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ (+@BonusADRatio.-1@ bonus AD, +@APRatio.-1@ AP) damage.

Cooldown: @Cooldown@ - @CooldownMin@s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

runes.name: Predator
runes.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg">adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Channel for 1.5s out of combat to gain 45% movement speed for 15s. Damaging attacks or abilities end this effect, dealing 60 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD)(+0.25 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 150s - 100s. Starts the game on cooldown. 50% cooldown if interrupted while channeling.

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDesc: Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Touch souls to absorb them and deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg">adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on your next attack based on total soul essence collected.
runes.longDesc:
Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Collect souls to become Soul Charged. Your next attack on a champion or structure consumes Soul Charged to deal bonus adaptive damage.

Soul Charged lasts @ONHDuration@s, increased to @ONHDurationLong@s after collecting @SoulsRequiredForIncreasedDuration@ soul essence.

Bonus damage: @DamageMin@ - @DamageMax@ (+@ADRatio.2@ bonus AD) (+@APRatio.1@ AP) + soul essence collected.

Champions - @champstacks@ soul essence.
Monsters - @monsterstacks@ soul essence.
Minions - @minionstacks@ soul essence.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct">impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals @DamageIncMin@ - @DamageIncMax@ bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: @Cooldown@s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.longDesc:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: @HealAmount@-@HealAmountMax@ (+@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD, +@APRatio.-1@ AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDesc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.longDesc:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you @BonusLethality.0@ Lethality and @BonusMpen.0@ Magic Penetration for @Duration@s.

Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDesc: After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. When your wards expire, they also reanimate as Zombie Wards.
runes.longDesc:
After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. Additionally, when your wards expire, they reanimate as Zombie Wards.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for @WardDurationMin@ - @WardDuration@s and don't count towards your ward limit.

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDesc: When you enter brush, a poro appears. It will stay behind to give you vision.
runes.longDesc:
Enter a brush to summon a poro after a brief channel. The poro will stay behind to give you vision until you summon a new one.

If an enemy enters brush with a poro in it, they scare it away, putting Ghost Poro on a @Cooldown@s cooldown.

Poro channel is interrupted if you take damage.

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion and ward <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown">takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive">adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
runes.longDesc:
Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of @AdaptiveForce.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage or @AdaptiveForce@ Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at @MaxEyeballs@ eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of @CompletionBonus.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage, or @CompletionBonus@ Ability Power.

Collect @StacksPerTakedown@ eyeballs per champion kill, @StacksPerAssist@ per assist, and @StacksPerWard@ per ward takedown.

runes.name: Ravenous Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent healing from ability damage.
runes.longDesc:
Heal for a percentage of the damage dealt by your abilities.
Healing: @StartingOmnivamp*100@% + @OmnivampPerStack*100@% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Healing reduced to one third for Area of Effect abilities.

runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent Active Item CDR (includes Trinkets).
runes.longDesc:
Gain @StartingActiveItemCDR.0*100@% Active Item CDR plus an additional @ActiveItemCDRPerStack.0*100@% per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @StartingOOCMS@ out of combat Movement Speed plus @OOCMS.0@ per Bounty Hunter stack.

Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Exchange Summoner Shards at the shop to change your Summoner Spells during game. Your Summoner Spells have reduced cooldowns.
runes.longDesc:
Gain a Summoner Shard at @ShardFirstMinutes@ min and another every @ShardRechargeMinutes@ min after (Max @Maxshards@ shards).

While near the shop, you can exchange @ShardCost@ Summoner Shard to replace a Summoner Spell with a different one.

Additionally, your Summoner Spell Cooldowns are reduced by @SummonerCDR.0*100@%.

Smite: Buying Smite won't grant access to Smite items
You cannot have two of the same Summoner Spell

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for @SlowDuration.0@s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to @SlowAmountBase.0*-100@% - @SlowAmountMax.0*-100@%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to @SlowAmountBaseMelee.0*-100@% - @SlowAmountMaxMelee.0*-100@%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for @SlowZoneDuration@s, slowing all units inside by @SlowZoneSlow*-100@%.

    Cooldown: @UnitCDBase@-@UnitCD16@s per unit

runes.name: Kleptomancy
runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for @ChannelDuration@s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: @CooldownTime@s. Goes on a @ChampionCombatCooldown@s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at @GiveBootsAtMinute@ min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown">takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come @SecondsSoonerPerTakedown@s sooner.
runes.longDesc:
You get free Slightly Magical Boots at @GiveBootsAtMinute@ min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots @SecondsSoonerPerTakedown@s sooner.

Slightly Magical Boots give you an additional +@AdditionalMovementSpeed@ Movement Speed.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Stasis">Stasis</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> effect.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after @InitialCooldown.0@ min. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.

Reduces the cooldown of Zhonya's Hourglass, Guardian Angel, and Gargoyle Stoneplate by @PercentGAZhonyasCDR.0*100@%.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: @ExcessCostPenaltyFlat@ gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with @GainedMinionKillers@ Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc:
Start the game with @GainedMinionKillers@ Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first @InitialCooldown@s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +@DamageBonusForAnyAbsorbed.0*100@% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +@DamageBonusPerAdditionalAbsorbed.0*100@% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every @BiscuitMinuteInterval@ min, until @SwapOverMinute@ min. Consuming a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every @BiscuitMinuteInterval@ mins, until @SwapOverMinute@ min.

Biscuits restore @HealthHealPercent.0*100@% of your missing health and mana. Consuming any Biscuit increases your mana cap by @PermanentMana@ mana permanently.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore @HealthHealPercentManaless.0*100@% missing health instead.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc:
+@CDR*100@% CDR
+@CDR*100@% Max CDR
+@CDR*100@% Summoner Spell CDR
+@CDR*100@% Item CDR
runes.longDesc:
+@CDR*100@% CDR
+@CDR*100@% Max CDR
+@CDR*100@% Summoner Spell CDR
+@CDR*100@% Item CDR

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby ally champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov">movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> or enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @MovementSpeedPercentBonus.0*100@% Movement Speed towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair.

Range: @ActivationDistance@

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.shortDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last @PotionDuration*100@% longer, and you gain @BonusMS*100@% Movement Speed while under their effects.
runes.longDesc: Your potions, biscuits and elixirs last @PotionDuration*100@% longer, and you gain @BonusMS*100@% Movement Speed while under their effects.

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion @HitsRequired@ consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for @AmpDuration@s.
runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with @HitsRequired@ consecutive basic attacks deals @MinDamage@ - @MaxDamage@ bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by @AmpPotencyStartSelf.0*100@ - @AmpPotencyMaxSelf.0*100@% from all sources for @AmpDuration@s.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.shortDesc: @LeadInDelay.1@s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
runes.longDesc:
@LeadInDelay.1@s after damaging a champion gain @AttackSpeedMin*100@ - @AttackSpeedMax*100@% Attack Speed (based on level) for @AttackSpeedBuffDurationMin@s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to @AttackSpeedBuffDurationMax@s.

Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized.

Energized attacks heal you for @HealBase@ - @HealMax@ (+@HealBonusADRatio.-1@ Bonus AD, +@HealAPRatio.-1@ AP) and grant +@MSBuff*100@% movement speed for @MSDuration.0@s.
Healing is @MinionHealMod*100@% as effective when used on a minion.
Healing is increased by @HealCritMod*100@% of your critical damage modifier when triggered by a critical hit.

runes.name: Overheal
runes.shortDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to @ShieldCapRatio.0*100@% of your total health + @MaxBaseShieldCap@.

Shield is built up from @ShieldGenerationRateSelf.0*100@% of excess self-healing, or @ShieldGenerationRateOtherMax.0*100@% of excess healing from allies.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown">Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore @MissingHealthRestored.0*100@% of your missing health and grant an additional @BonusGold@ gold.
runes.longDesc:
Takedowns restore @MissingHealthRestored.0*100@% of your missing health and grant an additional @BonusGold@ gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDesc: For @BuffDuration@s after gaining a level or takedown any mana you spend is fully restored.
runes.longDesc: For @BuffDuration@s after gaining a level or takedown any mana you spend is fully restored.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @AttackSpeedBase*100@% attack speed plus an additional @AttackSpeedPerStack*100@% for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @TenacityBase*100@% tenacity plus an additional @TenacityPerStack*100@% for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @LifeStealPerStack*100@% life steal for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.longDesc:
Deal @BonusPercentDamage.0 *100@% more damage to champions who have less than @EnemyHealthPercentageThreshold*100@% health.

Additionally, takedowns on champions grant an adaptive bonus of @AdaptiveForce.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage or @AdaptiveForce@ Ability Power for @Duration@s.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
runes.longDesc: Deal @MinBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% more damage to champions with @MinHealthDifference@ more max health than you, increasing to @MaxBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% at @MaxHealthDifference@ more max health.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.longDesc: Deal @MinBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% - @MaxBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% increased damage to champions while you are below @HealthThresholdStart.0*100@% health. Max damage gained at @HealthThresholdEnd.0*100@% health.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every @TriggerTime@s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every @TriggerTime@s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to @PercentHealthDamage.0@% of your max health
  • Heals you for @PercentHealthHeal.0*100@% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by @MaxHealthPerProc@

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by @RangedPenaltyMod*100@%.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize">immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg">adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> around you.
runes.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by @FlatResists@ - @FlatResistMaximum@ for @DelayBeforeBurst.1@s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: @StartingBaseDamage@ - @MaxBaseDamage@ (+@HealthRatio.-1@% of your maximum health) (+@DamageRatioAD*100@% of your bonus attack damage) (+@DamageRatioAP*100@% of your ability power)
Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage, you're both hasted and granted a shield.
runes.longDesc:
Guard allies within @SnuggleRange@ units of you, and allies you target with spells for @GuardDuration@s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take damage, both of you gain a shield and are hasted for @ShieldDuration@s.

Cooldown: @Cooldown@ - @CooldownMaxLevel@ seconds
Shield: @ShieldBase@ - @ShieldMax@ + @APRatio.-1@% of your ability power + @HPRatio.0*100@% of your bonus health.
Haste: +@Haste*100@% Movement Speed.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over @TotalDemolishTime@s, while within @DistanceToTower@ range of it. The charged attack deals @OutputDamagePerStack@ (+@MaxHealthPercentDamage.0 * 100@% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: @CooldownSeconds@s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov">Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDesc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for @MarkDuration@s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for @FlatHealAmount@ + @HealthRatio.-1 * 100@% of your max health over @HealDuration@s.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.shortDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next @BlockCount@ spells or attacks you receive from enemy deal @BlockBase@-@BlockMax@ less damage.

Duration: @BlockDuration@s
Cooldown: @Cooldown@s
runes.longDesc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next @BlockCount@ spells or attacks you receive from enemy deal @BlockBase@-@BlockMax@ less damage.

Duration: @BlockDuration@s
Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Iron Skin
runes.shortDesc:
Gain +@ArmorBase@ Armor.
Heals, including consumables, increase your Armor by @TotalExtraArmor*100@% temporarily.
runes.longDesc:
Gain +@ArmorBase@ Armor.

Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least @FlatHealThreshold@ health and shields increase your Armor by @TotalExtraArmor*100@% for @EvolveArmorDuration@s.

runes.name: Mirror Shell
runes.shortDesc:
Gain +@MRBase@ Magic Resist.
Heals, including consumables, increase your Magic Resist by @EvolveBonusMR*100@% temporarily.
runes.longDesc:
Gain +@MRBase@ Magic Resist.

Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least @FlatHealThreshold@ health and shields increase your Magic Resist by @EvolveBonusMR*100@% for @EvolveShellDuration@s.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After @MinutesRequired@ min gain +@ArmorBase@ Armor and +@MRBase@ Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by @ExtraResist@%.
runes.longDesc: After @MinutesRequired@ min gain +@ArmorBase@ Armor and +@MRBase@ Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by @ExtraResist@%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for @RegenPercentMax.0*100@% of your missing health +@RegenFlat.0@ over @RegenSeconds@s.

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc: Permanently gain @MaxHealthRatioPerTier*100@% maximum health for every @UnitsPerTier@ monsters or enemy minions that die near you.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are @StandardAmp.0@% stronger and increased by an additional @ExtraAmp.0@% on low health targets.
runes.longDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are @StandardAmp.0@% stronger and increased by an additional @ExtraAmp.0@% on targets below @HealthCutoff.0@% health.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a short duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain @BonusTenacity*100@% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for @BuffDuration@s. Additionally, gain @PersistTenacity*100@% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc:
Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemy champions or shielding allies.

Damage: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ based on level (+@DamageAPRatio.-1@ AP and +@DamageADRatio.-1@ bonus AD)
Shield: @ShieldBase@ - @ShieldMax@ based on level (+@ShieldRatio.-1@ AP and +@ShieldRatioAD.-1@ bonus AD)

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ based on level (+@APRatio.-1@ AP and +@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD)
Cooldown: @RechargeTime@ - @RechargeTimeMin@s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: @PercentRefund*100@%.
Area of Effect: @AoEPercentRefund*100@%.
Damage over Time: @DotPercentRefund*100@%.

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within @Window@s grants @HasteBase*100@ - @HasteMax*100@% Movement Speed based on level and @SlowResist*100@% Slow Resistance.

Duration: @Duration@s
Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below @PercHealthTrigger.0*100@%, gain a shield that absorbs @ShieldMin@ - @ShieldMax@ magic damage based on level (+@APRatio.-1@ AP and +@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD) for @ShieldDuration@s.

Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc: Periodically your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded and restores some of your missing mana or energy.
runes.longDesc: Every @Cooldown.0@s, your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded, and restores @MPToRestoreRatio.0*100@% of your missing mana or energy.

runes.name: The Ultimate Hat
runes.shortDesc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced.
runes.longDesc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced by @StartingCDR@%. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced by @CDChunkPerStack@%. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc: Gain @MaxCDR*100@% <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_CDR">CDR</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> when you reach level @LevelToTurnOn@. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive">adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @MaxCDR*100@% CDR when you reach level @LevelToTurnOn@.

Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to an adaptive bonus of @AdaptiveForce.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage or @AdaptiveForce@ Ability Power.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: Gain @PercentMS.0@% extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain extra AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive">adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> based on your bonus MS.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @PercentMS.0@% increased Movement Speed.
Your Bonus Movement Speed is converted to Attack Damage or Ability Power, adaptive at a rate of @AdaptiveAD*8@% Attack Damage or @AdaptiveAP*8@% Ability Power.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above @HealthPercent*100@% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg">adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.longDesc: While above @HealthPercent*100@% health, gain an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of up to @MaxAdaptive.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage or @MaxAdaptive@ Ability Power (based on level).

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first ability hit every @BurnlockoutDuration@s burns champions.
runes.longDesc:
Your next ability hit sets champions on fire dealing @damage@ - @damagemax@ bonus magic damage based on level after @dotduration@s.

Cooldown: @BurnlockoutDuration@s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_MS">MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive">adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.longDesc:
Gain @MovementSpeed@ Movement Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to @MaxAdaptive.-1*0.6@ Attack Damage or @MaxAdaptive@ Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key="LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive">adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc:
Every @UpdateAfterMinutes@ min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
